name: Isle of Peace
description:
Welcome to the Isle of Peace

The Isle of Peace is a first-person 3D cube-like game that sees you interact with the environment, animals and people on a peaceful island in the middle of the ocean.

So what is there to do?

  • Join the Fight School and use skills collected from townspeople to earn rewards and prove your strength.
  • Collect 50+ skills by talking to different people in different situations.
  • Collect the Isle's signature fruits to make dessert dishes and strengthen your bonds.
  • Change the weather and time of day with over 20 different scenes available where the character's and ambience is different.
  • Relax and fish by the river or the ocean.
  • Explore the Isle of Peace, Sky Isle, Disco Isle and Desert Isle.

So, what is there to do in THIS version?

Version 0.1.1

  • You can choose from 2 times of day (Day and Night) as well as 3 types of weather (Snow, Clear, Storm) - every Day/Night and Weather combination changes what is happening on the Isle.
  • Orient yourself with the fight school and test the skills you have against 4 different opponents.
  • Collect 20 different skills from the townspeople.
  • Buy, sell and collect fruits infinitely 
  • + much more!

PLEASE NOTE -

Isle of Peace will be updated regularly, so if you have any feedback please discuss it here and it can be fixed/implemented promptly. Bug fixes are produced daily and new builds are put out every week.

I hope you enjoy seeing this game grow.

Thank you!
